text: West Point is the oldest occupied military post in the United States. It is located on the Hudson River in New York, West Point. It is made up of including the campus of the United States Military Academy, which is commonly called "West Point". It is a Census Designated Place (CDP) located in the Town of Highlands in Orange County, New York,Highlands town, New York." U.S. Census Bureau. Retrieved on August 25, 2011."West Point CDP, New York." U.S. Census Bureau. Retrieved on August 25, 2011. located on the western bank of the Hudson River. The population was 7,341 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in New York (state)
title: West Point, New York
